name: relae

stmt.origin: relopabi(hs1, hs0, cae, wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cdif(cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))), cv(hs1))), nat0))

body.origin:
|- wrel(cae)
-| wceq(cae, copab(hs1, hs0, wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cdif(cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))), cv(hs1))), nat0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ Rel(ae)
⊣ ae = { < hs1, hs0 > |(hs0 `(⋃ dom(hs0)\ hs1))= 0 }

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(cae)
-| wceq(cae, copab(hs1, hs0, wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cdif(cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))), cv(hs1))), nat0)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Rel(ae)
⊣ ae = { < hs1, hs0 > |(hs0 `(⋃ dom(hs0)\ hs1))= 0 }

body.origin:
|- wceq(cae, copab(hs1, hs0, wceq(cfv(cv(hs0), cdif(cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))), cv(hs1))), nat0)))
-| diffss(hs1, hs0)
body.pretty:
⊢ ae = { < hs1, hs0 > |(hs0 `(⋃ dom(hs0)\ hs1))= 0 }
⊣ d(hs1, hs0)

comment: 'almost everywhere' is a relation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Oct-2017.)
